name: Cool Pipo: An Adventure for Climate Change
name_original: Cool Pipo: An Adventure for Climate Change
description:
Join Pipo, a penguin living in an iceberg in Antarctica. Unfortunately, over the years the world's temperature has started to increase and Pipo's home has started rapidly melting, living Pipo with the task to find a new place for him and his family while overcoming obstacles across his environment.

Run, jump and slide across the map to reunite Pipo with his family in a safer place! Join Pipo the penguin!

A penguin Platformer

Cool Pipo is a platform single player game where you play as Pipo the penguin, who has to run and slide across the map to get to a safer place where the ice is not melting.  

We are developing a game where we can teach about environmental awareness and how Climate Change is changing our environment and affecting different species. 

This time, in the life of Pipo the Penguin. Try our first test of the Alpha version of the game! Available for PC and Android (soon). 

Stay up-to-date with Cool Pipo's development and support us!

For any inquiries about the game or any ideas that could help get Pipo to a better place and make our Earth great again, don't forget to join our Discord Server!
